alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Claiborne; Jackson; Lincoln; Ouachita; Union; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 3:14PM CDT until July 16 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Webster Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Jackson Parish in north central Louisiana... Union Parish in north central Louisiana... Western Ouachita Parish in north central Louisiana... Claiborne Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Lincoln Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 314 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Atlanta to 9 miles southeast of Homer to 12 miles east of Ringgold, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Numerous trees and power lines have been downed across Northwest Louisiana from these storms. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ruston, Claiborne, Minden, Grambling, Jonesboro, Homer, Farmerville, Arcadia, Haynesville, Bernice, Ringgold, Sibley, Gibsland, Dubberly, Heflin, Cooley, Dubach, Choudrant, Simsboro and Marion. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Bienville; Claiborne; Jackson; Lincoln; Ouachita; Union; Webster
